sentences.sContent: My dear sir, I've no wish to extenuate the Count'stransgressions;
sentences.sContent_eng: My dear sir, I've no wish to extenuate the Count'stransgressions;
sentences.sCn: 先生，我井不想减轻伯爵的过失；

synos.tran: 减轻；低估；为…找借口；使人原谅

remMethod.val: exten (看作extend， 延伸) + ate → 向外扩张减轻局部受损 → 减轻

words.tran: 为…找借口；能减轻…的严重性；轻视（extenuate的ing形式）

trans.tranOther: to represent (an offence, a fault, etc) as being less serious than it appears, as by showing mitigating circumstances
